DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS FOCUS : NEWPORT BEACH ; HOTEL WINS AWARD FOR ENERGY EFFICIENCY
DOC.TEXT: Le Meridien Hotel has received an energy efficiency award from Southern California Edison Co . for installing energy efficiency equipment and adopting practices that will reduce energy consumption and save the hotel up_to $ 50 # 000 a year . The measures include variable-speed drive controls on air conditioners and water_pumps and controls that reduce air conditioning and use outdoor air when the weather cools . HOLLY J . WAGNER
